summary: A grounded fantasy ENB with many moods. Features bright, beautiful landscapes, bleak weathers, and cinematic interiors. Includes additional shaders. Highly customizable!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][b][size=5][center][/center][center][color=#cccccc]Cirilla ENB
[/color][/center][center][/center][/size][/b]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rS2UZ6][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8751/16975117351_85d63b7a8c_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=4]
The Cirilla ENB is a grounded fantasy ENB that is inspired by CD Projekts lighting and effects. Beware this ENB is very demanding.

Thanks to Hodilton for making a wonderful video!

[youtube]bGDD2TLs94A[/youtube]
[youtube]SCOvKyIpebE[/youtube]

[/size]
(Screenshots below were taken with Ultra Preset at either 2715x1527 or 4k resolution with Standard Shaders)
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rcSXk7][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8797/16543342384_5ef068ac41_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/s9GmFA][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7599/17163681992_5a9929dff7_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rSot1P][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8752/16979127339_a3a718b7af_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/s9qcXA][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7644/17160530852_e25c4ebac3_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/s5zJhj][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7723/17117122882_abc71523e0_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rLmRwk][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8762/16910913859_fe99cb4ba0_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/s3PcMt][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8734/17097118865_eddc71d9ba_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/s2RnrR][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7675/17086225095_38a1d36349_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rFz8vD][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8720/16856726507_551f49d594_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rHjRG3][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7656/16876574710_66923a7b2e_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rGiCMn][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7700/16865019679_678819bfc5_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/r2KWBN][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8736/16428809244_ae47c7fa67_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rEr4ue][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7688/16843835577_600f790ca8_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rEMPmW][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7631/16847885410_4264a21942_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rE8zKd][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7652/16840425350_ea9f2b9f1c_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#f4f4f4][center][size=5]Installation
[/size][/center][/color]
[size=4]Installing this ENB is simple, but you must follow it closely or it may not work properly or your PC may explode(not really). First download the preset you want (Ultra, Light, etc) and extract to a folder somewhere on your PC. Uninstall or remove any files from previous ENBs. Copy everything in the folder "Skyrim Main Folder" into your Skyrim directory; usually "....steamapps/common/Skyrim". It will probably ask you to merge the data folder and click "yes". If you want to use Cinema shaders just merge the "enbseires" folder file with the one you just installed and click "copy and replace" to overwrite the standard shaders. Here is an example of the Cinema shaders.


[img]http://i4.minus.com/irxbVUgHs4cnx.jpg[/img] [/size]

[size=4]Then download the latest enbbinary from Boris's website. Extract it to your PC somewhere. Copy the enbhost and d3d9.dll from the wrapper version and place it in the Skyrim directory. [/size]
[size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4]ADD or change the following lines to the SkyrimPrefs.ini (the one in My Documents), [Display] section :
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
fGamma=1.0400

If you use something like Mod Organizer, you will need to make the changes with its SkyrimPrefs.

You will then need to activate the [color=#00ff00]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics plugin[/color] with Nexus Mod Manager or another program. Be Sure to do this for the full experience!
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4]This enb requires one other file to run properly:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12454/?]Further Dark Dungeons[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?]
[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4]I [u]highly[/u] recommend the following:
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?] Realistic Water Two[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?] Realistic Clouds[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?]True Storms
[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size]
IMPORTANT: Please note that this ENB uses Sweetfx and screenshots must be taken using the "Print Screen" key or you will not get all the effects in your screenshots. Using the Steam overlay screenshots function will NOT capture any of the changes made by Sweetfx. The screenshots will appear in your Skyrim directory.

This ENB is not intended to be used with ELFX, Climates of Tamriel or the like. It is only intended to be used with Dark Dungeons. Since it uses the NLA plugin, it may conflict with some weather mods. Compatible with mods like True Storms though.

In the optional files I am including a pack of Mindflux Particle Patches. I highly recommend installing these as well. Installation is simple, just download them, extract them to a folder, and copy and merge them with the Skyrim Data folder. Overwrite if necessary, though you may want to backup the older files you have.

[center][size=5][/size][/center]

[/size][/size][/size][/size][center][color=#00ffff][size=5]Credits[/size][/color][/center][center][/center]I would like to thank the following for their hard work and permission to use their files.
Kyo- For Bloom, Sunsprites, lens files (from lens texture file).
ZeroKing- For effect.tx (shaders)
Prod80- For enbeffect (same as Elder Blood ENB file)
Confidence-Man- NLA plugin
--JawZ-- For lensmask
[/size][size=4][size=5][size=4]Matso for Skryim Visual Immersion Enb Resource (used enbdefs)
[/size][/size][size=5][size=4]Andrej Dudenhefner - Creator of SMAA injector
Christian Jensen - Creator of SweetFX[/size][/size]
Boris for ENB
Mindflux- For Particle Patch

[/size][size=4][size=5][size=4]Also my follower on Flickr for being awesome people.

For more screenshots of Skyrim and other games follow me on Flickr [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/129202825@N08/]HERE![/url][/size][/size]
[size=4]I have a couple of mod request so if you are a capable modeler send me a message. I would appreciate it.[/size]
[/size]
author: CommanderBrigthside
